Description:\nJuliano Asmar ... Creating Art & Beauty As a contemporary artist and a beauty creator, Juliano Asmar,styles the hair with his unique and exceptional vision of Art. He manipluates colors and textures to create great looks for modern women. From Baabda and Hazmieh, to Amman in Jordan, Juliano Asmar is still Going forward to respond to all women expectations. Juliano Asmar is the exclusive hairdresser for all LBC,OTV,Hiya & Tele Liban TV Stations staffs.
